name: Phantom F4 II
overview: An action full-graphic game, in the style of American action adventure films. The game directly follows on from PHANTOM F4 I., however, it is designed completely independently, so it can be played regardless of whether you have seen the first part. After freeing the captive from the hands of the dangerous terrorists, the hero with his gentle entourage manages to shoot through and finally encounters the PHANTOM F4. However, there is only room for one person in it. Therefore, the pilot, like a proper gentleman, let the girl fly away. Sam tries to make his way to the coast, where a private yacht was waiting for him. In addition, now I have a good opportunity to punish the remaining terrorists for their bad deeds.
